author: Richard King
comment: Like the watchface howvwe does not read correct temp,  when you set temp to Celcius it showS 278, 273,274 etc which sucks seems i bout this face

author: Robert Rytel
comment: Moto 360 2nd Gen  Battery 🔋 consumption still needs improvement,   full charge only last about 14 hrs.,  should be at least 24hrs. When that is achieved,  I will gladly rate 5 stars, that is my only complaint,  this is one of best.
title: And Watchface for Moto 360

author: Troy Harmon
comment: I have not had a chance to look at everything this face to offer quite yet but so far seems to be badass watch

author: Mathew Williams
comment: I just purchased this watch face and cannot get it to come up. Furious

author: Terry Olinger
comment: Not good, I feel ripped off.
title: I just now noticed I was billed for this but never used or even installed it. Not good at all

author: The 1 & Only merryman
comment: Rad

author: Sivacharan Chandrasekar
comment: I love this watch face and this is going to be my everyday watch face until something better shows up which i doubt. But why doesn't the watch face has the current weather. Miss the current weather very bad. 5 starts if it has current weather.
title: Great watch face except one

author: Christopher Flanagan
comment: All the important info  right on your wrist.  Even the dim mode looks great
title: Great watch face.

author: Jacklyn Martinez
comment: It kills the 🔋 very quickly.. 😢 do not feel like carrying a charger around all day for this..
title: Love the watch face and all the features.. But

author: Ryan Houberg
comment: Will not show any watch face available in Android wear app. Reinstalled and resynched and restarted phone and moto 360 1st gen. Still nothing.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I can give you a help,please feel free to contact our email address.Or please check 2nd question of http://androidwearface.com/face_faq_en.html
Thank you

title: Will not show up in Android wear app.

author: Deane Carr
comment: Not all settings are showing up?  Can't even adjust the color. Very cumbersome to navigate.killed my battery less than an hour

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
The setting screen is in the 'Android Wear' app on your phone.
So, please open the 'Android Wear' app on your phone and you'll find the A48 settings in the facelist on the Android Wear app.
For additional question,please feel free to contact our email address.Thank you.

author: Amninder Singh
comment: I love this application. Must have its very attractive.
title: Must have application

author: ShizNick
comment: Absolutely LOVE IT! BRILLIANT! MUST HAVE! I would REALLY REALLY LOVE the colours of the Ambient Mode (dark blue and black) as a choice for the daily driver.... Would save a ton of battery on the 360.
title: Simply The BEST Moto 360 Face!

author: Kabish
comment: As one would expect it does use up some battery. Has pretty much all the info you need.
title: Great face

author: Gürkan Ezerçe
comment: One of my favorite watch face! Its really very nice looking watchface. Almost every informations are on the screen, but it kills battery quickly. Needs some optimizations.
title: Nice but need battery optimizations

author: Trung Châu Thành
comment: Lots of information shown on the face!
title: Great

author: Steve Moreland
comment: Boat load of data. Just wish it would display a little longer to take in all the readings.
title: Sweet!

author: Robert Brenneman
comment: Even with notifications off and theater mode on, my watch went from 75% to 35% overnight. I suspect the heart monitor is the cause, and will lower the check interval to see. Otherwise it's a great watch face.
title: Beautiful, but a battery killer

author: Mohammad Mujeeb
comment: I just love this watch face.. It's features are super awesome..
title: Excellent watch face

author: Edward Chow
comment: Dont buy it! Did not show up in app drawer or in android wear for Sony Xperia Z2 5.0 until the 4th time I install the watch face. My moto 360 cannot auto on and when I reset, then app fail again and can't find. Extremely not stable!!!!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please try following.
Launch Android Wear app -> Click the gear icon -> select your device -> Resync apps
That makes your android wear watch's software to the latest state.
And I can give you a help.So would you please dont hesitate to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Installation problem

author: David Traumann
comment: I love how busy it is and all the information you get from a single watch face. Tons of settings/options to choose from - the more the better imo. Weather is a little off but still acceptable. Wish you could use custom colors. It's quite a battery hog even with heart rate monitor turned off. Definitely worth the money.
title: One of my favorite wf

author: Mike Rowan
comment: Says to wait. Now I can't get refund. These people suck.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you give us more information in detail.
Please feel free to contact our email.
Thank you.

title: Doesn't work. Doesn't even show up on phone.

author: DAVID T
comment: Good design and functions
title: Good

author: perry farmer
comment: Probably not good for battery consumption.
title: Very good' but leaves blood pressure monitor on

author: Ken Stow
comment: Great face, very busy. Would really like time/date more prominent
title: Moto 360

author: Rick Cousins
comment: I like a lot of data on a display, but the choice of fonts and layout made this watch face too hard for me to read quickly. A subset of the data would have been better for me: time, date, hr, temp, wind, current wx. If I want more details I'll access the phone.
title: Too small for quick glance or older users

author: Mark Long
comment: By far my favorite watch face. I knocked it down two stars because for a while I couldn't figure out why it wouldn't show up on my watch or phone anymore. It had to be installed through the watch first. Next, the temperature tries to display 3 digits, whether fahrenheit or celsius for some reason and doesn't have the space for it. Finally, it has some battery drain issues which I try to mitigate by turning down the heart rate sensor times, brightness and time before the ambient mode kicks in.

author: Robert McDougall
comment: Doesn't work, displaying multiple hands on my watch and little else. Looked nothing like in the pictures and video.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I'd like to improve.
First of all,could you please give us your situation more in detail ,and send us that screen shot.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Marc Sleigh
comment: The heart rate literally drains battery :(
title: Nice but..
